nodes.support_text: CBS News producer Ahmad Mukhtar was at American University in Afghanistan this evening when it came under attack by Taliban fighters.

nodes.description: Mukhtar, also a student at the University in Kabul, called CBSN to report the attack
nodes.support_text: Mukhtar called into CBSN this afternoon.

nodes.description: While escaping to the university's backside, Mukhtar heard approaching gunshots during the evacuation
nodes.support_text: While we were escaping we could still hear the gunshots and as we were trying to escape the gunshots were getting closer and closer to us

nodes.description: Mukhtar reported that several friends and professors were trapped inside the university during the attack
nodes.support_text: #AUAF under attack. I along with my friends escaped and several other of my friends and professors trapped inside.
